options.panelConfig:
---
anchors:
  thresholds-operstate: &thresholds-operstate
    - color: "#FF3154" # red
      level: 0
    - color: "#4BDD33" # green
      level: 1
  thresholds-traffic: &thresholds-traffic
    - color: "#bec8d2" # grey
      level: 0
    - color: "#4BDD33" # green
      level: 200000    # 200 Kbps = 300,000 bps
    - color: "#FFFF00" # yellow
      level: 500000    # 0.5 Mbps = 500000  bps
    - color: "#FF8000" # orange
      level: 1000000   # 1 Mbps = 1,000,000 bps
    - color: "#FF3154" # red
      level: 2000000   # 2 Mbps = 2,000,000 bps
  label-config: &label-config
    separator: replace
    units: bps
    decimalPoints: 1

cellIdPreamble: cell-
cells:
  spine1:ethernet-1/1:leaf1:ethernet-1/49:
    dataRef: oper-state:spine1:ethernet-1/1
    fillColor:
      thresholds: *thresholds-operstate
  link_id:spine1:ethernet-1/1:leaf1:ethernet-1/49:
    dataRef: spine1:ethernet-1/1:out
    label: *label-config
    strokeColor:
      thresholds: *thresholds-traffic
  spine1:ethernet-1/2:leaf2:ethernet-1/49:
    dataRef: oper-state:spine1:ethernet-1/2
    fillColor:
      thresholds: *thresholds-operstate

targets.expr: {component="kafka-alarms", namespace_name="clab-eda-st"} | json | line_format "{{if eq .cleared \"true\"}}-- CLEARED -- {{end}}Severity: {{.severity}} Name: {{.alarm_name}} Description: {{.description}}"
